title: New winter opening rates at the Cristallo Hotel Spa & Golf in Cortina, Italy
text:
New winter opening rates at the Cristallo Hotel Spa & Golf in Cortina, Italy New winter opening rates at the Cristallo Hotel Spa & Golf in Cortina, Italy Details Category: Hotel   15:00 The Cristallo Hotel Spa & Golf is gearing up for the new ski season 2015/2016 and looks forward to welcoming families, couples and winter sport enthusiasts to another season in Cortina d’Ampezzo, a location unrivalled by any other in the Dolomites. The Cristallo Hotel is the only five star deluxe property situated in Italy’s premier mountain resort, exclusively positioned in the breath-taking UNESCO World Natural Heritage site. Cortina is part of the Dolomiti Superski area, the world’s largest skiing carousel linking 12 fantastic ski resorts including a wide range of slopes for every level of difficulty with over 1220 km of pistes and 450 lifts. 
Besides thrilling downhill, excellent cross country and free-style skiing, Cortina also offers themed ski-tours in the Ampezzo valley. These tours are fascinating excursions that push skiers to their limits; whether it is tackling the spectacular Olympia ski-tour, including the famous downhill piste to Rumerlo where the Olympic flame burned during the 1956 games or exploring Cortina’s history during the 80km Great War Ski Tour. For those days that guests don’t feel like hitting the slopes, the Cristallo Hotel offers a 1600 sqm wellness and beauty area, boasting a large indoor swimming pool, a sauna, Turkish bath and solarium. The hotel is also equipped with a Transvital Swiss Beauty Spa and luxury fitness club. With the Kids Club, a play-room for the little ones inside the facilities, dedicated skiing instructors and a kid’s spa menu, families are well looked after at the Cristallo. Adding to a long list of unique experiences available to Cristallo guests, the team at the hotel can arrange for an exclusive shopping spree at Franz Kraler, a luxury boutique in the centre of Cortina d’Ampezzo that will only open its doors after hours for Cristallo guests. One of the latest additions to the dedicated five start amenities at the Cristallo Hotel is an exclusive VIP arrival and departure service. A representative of the Cristallo Hotel will greet guests upon their arrival at the aircraft, where a private vehicle will escort hotel guests quickly and smoothly through passport control, baggage claim as well as customs and assist with the luggage and onwards transfer to the Cristallo Hotel Spa & Golf. Upon departure guests will be offered luggage assistance and guided throughout check in and are able to access the priority lane at the security gate. Related articles
